Translations.Text: Ona cestovat ziaden scribe bol available puto posta zaruka repayment! Jeden trusted v this chovanie he spatny listok puto when due he observe GOD jeho Lord Nie withhold any testimony by zatajit co ona svedok! Ktokolvek withholds testimony bol sinful o srdce GOD JE fully aware z everything ONA ROBIT

Do GOD belongs everything heavens zem! Whether ona declare tvoj innermost thoughts keep them zatajit GOD holds ona zodpovedny for them. He forgives whomever He wills punishes whomever He wills! GOD bol Omnipotent

Posol has verit v co sent nadol him jeho Lord a so robit believers! They verit v GOD Jeho angels Jeho scripture Jeho posol My nie robit distinction any z Jeho posol They say My hear my obey Forgive us our Lord Do Ona bol ultimate destiny

GOD never burdens soul its ZNAMENAT its credit bol CO it ZARABAT against bol CO it commits Our Lord nie condemn us my zabudnut robit zamenit! Our Lord chranit us z blaspheming Ona mat rad those before us robit! Our Lord chranit us z zhresit it becomes i noskorsie us repent Pardon us forgive us! Ona bol our Lord Zvladnut Grant us victory disbelieving ludia
GOD there NIE bol god except He ZIVY the Eternal
He sent ona this scripture truthfully confirming all previous scriptures He sent nadol Torah Gospel
before ze, do guide ludia He sent statute kniha! Those disbelieve GOD's revelations incur severe retribution. GOD bol Almighty Avenger
He bol Jeden shapes ona wombs mat rad He wills. There nie bol inak god Him; Almighty Wise

He sent ona this scripture containing straightforward verses -Kto constitute essence scripture -I mat rad multiple-meaning allegorical verses Those harbor doubts ich srdce pursue multiple-meaning verses create zmatok extricate certain vyznam! Ziaden zauzlit true vyznam thereof except GOD those lepsi founded znalost! They say My verit v this -all z it pojdem our Lord Len those possess inteligencia berie heed
Our Lord let nie our srdce waver teraz ze Ona guided us! Lejak us Tvoj zlutovanie; Ona bol Grantor
Our Lord Ona iste zozbierat ludia dni bol inevitable! GOD never ZLOMIT promise
Those disbelieve never pomoc ich peniaze nor ich dieta GOD They je kurivo Hell
Mat Rad Pharaoh's ludia those them they zamietnut our revelations consequently GOD punished them ich zhresit. GOD bol strict v enforcing retribution
Say do those disbelieve Ona defeated potom zozbierat Hell; co chudobny abode

Vzor set ona 2 armies clashed -1 army boj zapricinit GOD chvila inaksie disbelieving They saw ich own oci they bol dva krat mat rad vela. GOD supports JEHO victory whomever He wills. This zadovazit assurance those possess vision
Zdobit ludia bol worldly radost such mat rad zensky having dieta piles piles z zlaty silver vlak horses zivy inventar zozat. These bol latka this world Daleko lepsie abode rezervovat GOD
